about_the_game:
In Zero Distance you take the role of an Arabian freedom fighter trying to save his country from an invading occupation army. Waves of enemies will attack you and in this horde survival game it is their bullets and mines that you need to avoid. There are twenty waves and you need to defeat all enemies in each wave, and in between waves you buy weapons and upgrades to become more and more powerful. You can press the Tab key to seamlessly switch between top down mode or FPS mode. In FPS mode your firing is directed ahead of you making it an easy way to focus your firepower and you can jump to better avoid enemy projectiles.

  • Defeat 20 waves of enemies and buy new weapons and upgrades between waves.
  • Satisfying ragdoll physics.
  • Seamless switching between top down and FPS perspectives, play how you like.
  • Five player characters to unlock.
  • Five levels to conquer.
  • Twenty weapons to unlock; pistols, rifles, SMGs, RPG, mines, etc!
  • Plenty of meta progression to sink all that money into and become more powerful!
  • Relics that will help boost your character in some aspects but weaken them in others!
  • Plenty of Steam achievements to earn!
